name: Introduction to Rocket Propulsion
description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion and rocket engines.

lessons.name: History of Rocketry
lessons.description: A brief history of rocketry and space exploration.

lessons.name: Rocket Propulsion Fundamentals
lessons.description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion.

lessons.name: Rocket Engine Types
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket engines.

name: Fuel and Combustion
description: Understanding rocket fuel, combustion processes, and efficiency.

lessons.name: Rocket Fuel
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket fuels.

lessons.name: Combustion Processes
lessons.description: Understanding combustion processes and efficiency.

lessons.name: Combustion Instability
lessons.description: Understanding combustion instability and mitigation.

name: Nozzle Design
description: Principles of rocket nozzle design and performance optimization.

lessons.name: Nozzle Design
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket nozzles.

lessons.name: Nozzle Performance
lessons.description: Understanding nozzle performance and efficiency.

lessons.name: Nozzle Optimization
lessons.description: Optimizing nozzle design for specific applications.

name: Fundamentals of Aerodynamics
description: Basic aerodynamic concepts and fluid dynamics principles.

lessons.name: Fluid Properties and Behavior
lessons.description: Understanding fluid properties, viscosity, and flow characteristics.

lessons.name: Bernoulli's Principle and Applications
lessons.description: Exploring Bernoulli's equation and its aerodynamic applications.

lessons.name: Airfoil Theory and Lift Generation
lessons.description: Understanding how airfoils generate lift and basic wing theory.

name: Subsonic and Supersonic Flow
description: Understanding subsonic and supersonic aerodynamic behaviors.

lessons.name: Subsonic Flow Characteristics
lessons.description: Analysis of subsonic flow patterns and pressure distributions.

lessons.name: Transonic Flow Phenomena
lessons.description: Understanding the transition from subsonic to supersonic flow.

lessons.name: Supersonic Flow and Shock Waves
lessons.description: Exploring supersonic flow characteristics and shock wave formation.

name: Aerodynamic Heating
description: Study of aerodynamic heating and thermal protection systems.

lessons.name: Heat Transfer in High-Speed Flow
lessons.description: Understanding heat transfer mechanisms during high-speed flight.

lessons.name: Thermal Protection Systems
lessons.description: Design and materials for thermal protection in aerospace applications.

lessons.name: Re-entry Heating Analysis
lessons.description: Analyzing thermal loads during atmospheric re-entry.

name: Spacecraft Structural Design
description: Fundamentals of designing spacecraft structures and materials selection.

lessons.name: Structural Requirements and Loading
lessons.description: Understanding structural loads and requirements for spacecraft design.

lessons.name: Materials Selection for Space Applications
lessons.description: Choosing appropriate materials for spacecraft structural components.

lessons.name: Structural Analysis and Testing
lessons.description: Methods for analyzing and testing spacecraft structural integrity.

name: Orbital Mechanics
description: Understanding orbital dynamics and mission planning.

lessons.name: Kepler's Laws and Basic Orbits
lessons.description: Fundamental principles of orbital motion and Kepler's laws.

lessons.name: Orbital Maneuvers and Transfers
lessons.description: Planning and executing orbital transfers and maneuvers.

lessons.name: Mission Design and Trajectory Planning
lessons.description: Comprehensive mission planning and trajectory optimization.

name: Spacecraft Systems Engineering
description: Overview of spacecraft systems and subsystems engineering.

lessons.name: System Architecture and Requirements
lessons.description: Defining spacecraft system architecture and requirements analysis.

lessons.name: Power and Thermal Management Systems
lessons.description: Design of spacecraft power generation and thermal control systems.

lessons.name: Communication and Control Systems
lessons.description: Spacecraft communication systems and attitude control mechanisms.

name: Hydrocarbons and Basic Structures
description: Introduction to organic compounds, hydrocarbons, and structural analysis.

lessons.name: Alkanes and Cycloalkanes
lessons.description: Structure, nomenclature, and properties of saturated hydrocarbons.

lessons.name: Alkenes and Alkynes
lessons.description: Unsaturated hydrocarbons: structure, bonding, and reactivity.

lessons.name: Aromatic Compounds
lessons.description: Benzene and aromatic systems: structure and unique properties.

name: Functional Groups and Stereochemistry
description: Study of functional groups and three-dimensional molecular structure.

lessons.name: Alcohols, Ethers, and Carbonyls
lessons.description: Structure and properties of oxygen-containing functional groups.

lessons.name: Stereoisomerism
lessons.description: Chirality, enantiomers, and diastereomers in organic molecules.

lessons.name: Conformational Analysis
lessons.description: Understanding molecular conformations and their energetics.

name: Reaction Mechanisms and Synthesis
description: Organic reaction mechanisms and synthetic strategies.

lessons.name: Substitution and Elimination Reactions
lessons.description: SN1, SN2, E1, and E2 reaction mechanisms and factors affecting them.

lessons.name: Addition Reactions
lessons.description: Electrophilic and radical addition reactions to alkenes and alkynes.

lessons.name: Organic Synthesis Planning
lessons.description: Retrosynthetic analysis and multi-step synthesis strategies.

name: Coordination Chemistry
description: Study of metal complexes, coordination compounds, and bonding theories.

lessons.name: Complex Formation and Structure
lessons.description: Formation, nomenclature, and geometry of coordination complexes.

lessons.name: Crystal Field Theory
lessons.description: Understanding electronic structure and properties using crystal field theory.

lessons.name: Ligand Field Theory
lessons.description: Advanced bonding theories and molecular orbital approach to complexes.

name: Solid State and Materials Chemistry
description: Properties and applications of inorganic solids and materials.

lessons.name: Crystal Structures and Lattices
lessons.description: Understanding crystal systems, unit cells, and solid state structures.

lessons.name: Electronic and Magnetic Properties
lessons.description: Electrical conductivity, semiconductors, and magnetic behavior in solids.

lessons.name: Advanced Materials Applications
lessons.description: Catalysis, ceramics, and nanomaterials in modern technology.

name: Organometallic and Bioinorganic Chemistry
description: Study of metal-carbon bonds and metals in biological systems.

lessons.name: Organometallic Compounds
lessons.description: Structure, bonding, and reactivity of organometallic complexes.

lessons.name: Catalytic Processes
lessons.description: Homogeneous and heterogeneous catalysis using metal complexes.

lessons.name: Metals in Biological Systems
lessons.description: Role of metals in enzymes, transport proteins, and biological processes.

name: Thermodynamics and Equilibrium
description: Thermodynamic principles and chemical equilibrium in physical chemistry.

lessons.name: Laws of Thermodynamics
lessons.description: First, second, and third laws of thermodynamics and their applications.

lessons.name: Chemical Equilibrium
lessons.description: Equilibrium constants, Le Chatelier's principle, and phase equilibria.

lessons.name: Statistical Thermodynamics
lessons.description: Molecular interpretation of thermodynamic properties.

name: Kinetics and Reaction Dynamics
description: Study of reaction rates, mechanisms, and molecular dynamics.

lessons.name: Reaction Kinetics
lessons.description: Rate laws, reaction orders, and temperature dependence of rates.

lessons.name: Complex Reaction Mechanisms
lessons.description: Chain reactions, enzyme kinetics, and steady-state approximations.

lessons.name: Transition State Theory
lessons.description: Theoretical framework for understanding reaction rates and mechanisms.

name: Quantum Mechanics and Spectroscopy
description: Quantum mechanical principles and spectroscopic methods in chemistry.

lessons.name: Quantum Mechanics Fundamentals
lessons.description: Wave-particle duality, Schrödinger equation, and atomic orbitals.

lessons.name: Molecular Orbital Theory
lessons.description: Bonding and antibonding orbitals in molecules and molecular properties.

lessons.name: Spectroscopic Methods
lessons.description: UV-Vis, IR, NMR, and other spectroscopic techniques for molecular analysis.

name: Elvish Languages: Sindarin and Quenya
description: Comprehensive study of the two main Elvish languages of Middle-earth.

lessons.name: Sindarin Grammar and Structure
lessons.description: Phonology, morphology, and syntax of the Grey-elvish language.

lessons.name: Quenya: The High-elvish Tongue
lessons.description: Structure and usage of the ancient Elvish language of Valinor.

lessons.name: Elvish Scripts and Inscriptions
lessons.description: Tengwar script system and its application in Elvish texts.

name: Dwarvish and Other Languages
description: Study of Khuzdul and other languages of Middle-earth's peoples.

lessons.name: Khuzdul: The Secret Tongue
lessons.description: Structure and cultural significance of the Dwarvish language.

lessons.name: The Black Speech of Mordor
lessons.description: Analysis of the artificial language created by the Dark Lord.

lessons.name: Languages of Men and Hobbits
lessons.description: Common Speech (Westron) and regional dialects of Middle-earth.

name: Philological Methods and Historical Linguistics
description: Advanced methods for studying ancient languages and their evolution.

lessons.name: Comparative Linguistics in Middle-earth
lessons.description: Relationships between languages and their historical development.

lessons.name: Manuscript Analysis and Translation
lessons.description: Techniques for analyzing and translating ancient texts and inscriptions.

lessons.name: Cultural Context and Language Use
lessons.description: Understanding how language reflects culture and society in Middle-earth.

name: Historical Alliances and Conflicts
description: Major alliances and conflicts between the peoples of Middle-earth.

lessons.name: The Last Alliance of Elves and Men
lessons.description: Study of the great alliance against the Dark Lord in the Second Age.

lessons.name: The Kinstrife and Civil Conflicts
lessons.description: Internal conflicts within kingdoms and their diplomatic resolutions.

lessons.name: The War of the Dwarves and Orcs
lessons.description: Examining inter-species warfare and its aftermath.

name: Leadership and Wisdom in Diplomacy
description: Role of leaders and wise counselors in maintaining peace.

lessons.name: The Council of Elrond
lessons.description: Case study of multi-species decision-making and consensus building.

lessons.name: Wisdom of the Istari
lessons.description: The role of wizards as advisors and mediators in Middle-earth politics.

lessons.name: Royal Diplomacy and Statecraft
lessons.description: Diplomatic practices of the kingdoms of Men, Elves, and Dwarves.

name: War of the Ring: Crisis Diplomacy
description: Diplomatic challenges and solutions during the War of the Ring.

lessons.name: Building the Fellowship
lessons.description: Formation of multi-species cooperation under crisis conditions.

lessons.name: Rohan and Gondor Alliance
lessons.description: Renewal of ancient alliances and mutual aid agreements.

lessons.name: Post-War Reconstruction and Peace
lessons.description: Diplomatic efforts in rebuilding Middle-earth after the great conflict.
